Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

From: KSLawdogg@...

Bumblebee/Double Punch/Injector/Manterror/Counter Punch/The Oblitercons/Koga 
Shuko/Unitron/Hades/Anubis/Serpentor/Nemesis Enforcer:




Shuko laughed.  "Y...y...you're the great Liono Prime?!" he bent over in a 
riot, laughing like Hell.  "So pathetic and stupid, hehe, we'll win!" he 
yelled, the blast sending him landing on his skid plate.
---

Unitron chuckled, diving down, he targeted Key, firing two missiles, one from 
each wing, at the female Maximal, a burst of 20 rapid lasers flashing out at 
Liono's back.

---

Anubis twirled throuh the air as he was hit by Tigerhawk's blasts, landing on 
his knees.  Raising his launcher, he fired a rocket off at Tigerhawk.

---

Hades, got in behind the other Maximals, firing five laser bolts at 
Tigerhawk's back, an optic blast at Liono's back.

--- 

Most of the Predacons (Double Punch, Counter Punch, Manterror, Injector, and 
Bumblebee) assembled as they saw the Maximals retreating,  Giving chase after 
the Maximals, Dark One had been chasing, they chuckled.  They would finish 
it...tonight.

---

Both punching, Nemesis went flying backwards through the air, slamming to the 
ground from 30 ft up.  At the same time, Nemesis' punch sent Serpentor 
slamming to the ground downwards.  Both getting up quickly, 
Anubis twirled througSerpentor tackled Nemesis, two swift punches followed.  
Raising his rapid laser rifle, he fired twenty blasts.  Ten at Blue Stinger, 
ten at Antagony.  Turning his head, an uppercut from Nemesis sent him to the 
ground on his back.

---

The Oblitercons, all in their vehicle modes except for Hiss, and minus Dark 
One, exited into the clearing where the Maximals and Newcomers were, 
chuckling madly.
